summary: Continuous real-world operations including livestock environment monitoring, human–animal interaction, crop maintenance, household energy preparation, and water management under extreme heat conditions.

proofs.title: Morning Interaction With the Last Remaining Duck
Midday Firewood Preparation for Household Cooking
Midday Water Pumping Under High Heat Conditions

integrity_notes: All proofs are recorded sequentially and time-anchored.
Absence of production is recorded as valid data.
Human labor and household activities are treated as first-class data entities.
No data has been edited or optimized after capture.
